Japi2 - Class in de.japi
The main class of the JAPI2 kernel, which manages all tasks and handles all requests of the JAPI2 kernel.
Japi2AboutWindow - Class in de.japi.components
This class is a simple about dialog for the Japi2 Kernel.
Japi2AboutWindow() - Constructor for class de.japi.components.Japi2AboutWindow
Constructs the about window.

Creates a new ActionListener for a specific event type.

Creates a new AdjustmentListener for a specific event type.

This class provides modal dialogs for the Japi2 Kernel.

Japi2GridLayout - Class in de.japi.components.layout
This class wraps the GridLayout to provide a workaround for a nasty Swing bug: if a panel with the GridLayout is set twice to the same column or row value the component needs to be revalidated.
